1321:10: avadyasamudācāre ātmana evāpratirūpatāṃ viditvā bodhisattvasya lajjā hrīḥ|
1321:12: sā punarllajjā bodhisattvasya prakṛtyaiva tīvrā bhavati prāgevābhyastā|
1321:21: tathā bodhisattvasya kaukṛtye samutpanne sapratisaraṇe ānuṣaṅgike yā lajjā|
1321:27: kliṣṭacittasanniyacchanatā kleśavaśā [na] nuyāyitā duḥkhādhivāsanaśīlatā vicitraprabhūtodriktairapi bhayabhairavairāmukhaiḥ samyak prayogāvikampanatā prakṛtisattvayogāt pratisaṃkhyānādvā dhīratā|
1321:29: asyāḥ khalu bodhisattvānāṃ dhṛtibalādhānatāyāḥ samāsataḥ pañcavidhamadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyam|
1321:35: tatra pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairaparikhinnamānasatā bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasamyak prayogeṣu veditavyā|
1321:36: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā balavān bhavati yena na parikhidyate|
1321:37: punaḥ saivākhinnamānasatā'nena punaḥ punarabhyastā bhavati yena na parikhidyate|
1321:38: punarupāyaparigṛhītenavīryāṃrambheṇa prayukto bhavati yena paurvāparyeṇa viśeṣaṃ samanupaśyan na parikhidyate|
1321:39: tīvreṇa ca prajñāpratisaṃkhyānabalena samanvāgato bhavati yena na parikhidyate|
1321:40: tīvrañcāsya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kāruṇyacittamanukampācittaṃ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati yena na parikhidyate|
1321:42: iha bodhisattvena pañcavidhāsthānānyārabhya nāmakāya-padakāya-vyañjanakāya-pratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ parataḥ sugṛhīto bhavati|
1321:44: tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthaḥ parato vā suśruto bhavati|
1321:45: svayaṃ vā suvici[nti] to bhavati svabhyūhitaḥ|
1321:46: evamapi ca dharmajñenārthajñena bodhisattvena tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthasyāvismaraṇāya prayogo'nirākṛto bhavatyanyasya cābhinavasyābhinavasyottarottarasya dharmārthaviśeṣasya jñānāya|
1321:47: śrutacintāniṣṭhāgatenāpi cānena kālāntarakṛtaḥ paripākaḥ prasādaḥ tasmindharme cārthe ca pratilabdho bhavati|
1321:48: ebhirākārairbodhisattvasyāpramāṇā paripūrṇā aviparītā ca śāstrajñatā veditavyā|
1321:50: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhyaivaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti-kṛcchraṃ vatāyaṃ loka āpanno yaduta jāyate'pi jīryate'pi mriyate'pi cyavatepyupapadyatepyatha ca punaramī sattvā jarāmaraṇasyottari niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ [na] prajānantīti|
1321:52: niṣkaṣāyānutsadakaṣāyakālatāñca yaduta pañcakaṣāyānārabhya āyuṣkaṣāyaṃ [sattvakaṣāyaṃ] kleśakaṣāyaṃ kalpakaṣāyam|
1321:53: tadyathā etarhyalpaṃ jīvitaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yaściraṃ jīvati sa varṣaśatam|
1321:54: tadyathaitarhi sattvā yadbhūyasā [a] mātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā na kulajyeṣṭhāpacāyakā nārthakarā na kṛtyakarā na iha loke na paraloke avadye bhayadarśino na dānāni dadati na puṇyāni kurvanti nopavāsamupavasanti na śīlaṃ samādāya vartante|
1321:55: tadyathaitarhi yadbhūyasā'dharmarāgāśca viṣamalobhāśca śastrādānadaṇḍādānakalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaśāṭhyavañcananikṛtimṛṣāvādamithyādharmasaṃgṛhītā anekavidhāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ prajñāyante|
1321:56: tadyathaitarhi saddharmapralopāya saddharmāntardhānāya saddharmapratirūpakāṇi prabhūtāni prādurbhūtāni mithyādharmārtha-santīraṇāpūrvikāṇi|
1321:61: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhya lokajño bhavati|
1321:62: punarbodhisattvo bhājanalokasya saṃvartavivartaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yathā bhājanalokaḥ saṃvartate vivartate ca|
1321:63: punarbodhisattvo lokañca [loka] samudayañca lokanirodhañca lokasamudayagāminīñca pratipadaṃ lokanirodhagāminīñca pratipadaṃ lokasyāsvādamādīnavañca niḥsaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:64: punarbodhisattvaḥ cakṣuryāvanmanaḥ arūpiṇaśca skandhāṃścāturmahābhautikañca puruṣasya samucchrayametāvanmanuṣyatvamityucyate|
1321:65: tatra yā saṃjñā ātmā vā sattvo veti saṃjñāmātramevaitat|
1321:66: tatra yā pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmi yāvanmanasā dharmāna vijānāmīti pratijñāmātrameva tat|
1321:67: tatra yo vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evaṃjātīya evaṃgotra evamāhāra evaṃ sukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīryāyurevaṃ cirasthitika evamāyuṣparyanta iti vyavahāramātramevaitaditi sarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:68: iti hi sa bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokapravṛttiñca bhājanalokapravṛttiñca aṣṭākāralokopaparīkṣārthañca [lokaparamārthaṃ ca] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:70: punarbodhisattvo vṛddhatarakaṃ guṇaprativiśiṣṭatarakaṃ dṛṣṭvā samyak saṃbhāṣayatyutthāyāsanenopanimantrayati abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalisāmīcīkarma pravartayati|
1321:71: tulyaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā samyagālapati pratisamodayati ślakṣṇairmadhurairvacanapathaiḥ|
1321:73: hīnaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā śaktyā guṇādhānamārabhya protsāhayati|
1321:78: nāpyarthikaṃ kenaciddharmāmiṣeṇa taṃ jñātvā vimukho bhavati bhṛkuṭīkṛtaḥ|
1321:81: tathā sarveṣāmeva hīnatulyaviśiṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvābhibhāṣī ca bhavati|
1321:82: ehi svāgatavādī samyak pratiśāmakaśca samyagdharmāmiṣābhyāṃ yathāśaktyā saṃgrāhakaśca|
1321:83: nāpi ca sattveṣu kuṭilagāmbhīryopeto bhavati na garvitaḥ kenacidevocchrayaviśeṣeṇa|
1321:84: yathopāttaṃ sattvaṃ sarvopakaraṇairapi nādhyupekṣate glānaṃ vā svasthaṃ vā ānulomikena ca kāyavākkarmaṇā|
1321:85: yathā saṃstutaṃ tathaivāsaṃstutaṃ sarvaṃ mitrasakhā ca bhavati vigatapratyarthikaḥ|
1321:86: sarveṣāñcānāthānāmapratisaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ cārthakriyāṃ karoti|
1321:87: na ca kenacit paryāyeṇa pareṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamupasaṃharati kaccideṣāṃ muhūrtamapyasparśavihāro bhavatviti|
1321:88: etameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā parihasannapi paraiḥ saha yuktaparihāso bhavati nāyuktaparihāsaḥ|
1321:89: asatyavacanāni ca na kathayatyapi niratyayaiḥ paramaviśrambhopagatairvayasyakaiḥ|
1321:91: kroddho'pi ca pareṣāṃ na marmāṇi kīrtayati|
1321:92: paraiśca kāyena vācā vāhataḥ san pratisaṃkhyāya dharmatāṃ vā pratisarati ātmānameva vā'parādhikaṃ paśyati|
1321:98: dṛṣṭadharmahitārthaṃ vā bhogapratisaṃyuktamārabhya utthānasaṃpanno bhavatyārakṣāsaṃpannaḥ samajīvī|
1321:103: nikṣiptasya viśvāsena paradraviṇasya na drogdhā bhavati|
1321:104: upāttasya parata ṛṇasya na visaṃvādayitā bhavati|
1321:106: ratnaṃ vā ratnasammatamupādāya yāvat kārṣāpaṇe'pi sammūḍhānāṃ na vipralambhayitā bhavati vipralobhyainām|
1321:108: teṣu ca teṣvarthakaraṇīyeṣu parairāyācitaḥ san sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati na vikampate nānyenānyaṃ pratisarati|
1321:110: rājyaṃ vā punaḥ kārayan dharmeṇa kārayati nāgharmeṇa|
1321:114: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditayā śrute mate vijñāte vijñātavāditayā adṛṣṭe'dṛṣṭavāditayā aśrute'mate'vijñāte avijñātavāditayā ityebhirevaṃ bhāgīyairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo yathā loke vijñātavyo yathā loke vartitavyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tasmāllokajña ityucyate|
1321:116: iha bodhisattvaḥ arthārthī parato dharmaṃ śruṇoti na vyañjanābhisaṃskārārthī|
1321:117: so'rthārthī dharmaṃ śuṇvan na vyañjanārthī prākṛtayāpi vācā dharmaṃ deśayamānamarthapratisaraṇo bodhisattvaḥ satkṛtya śṛṇoti|
1321:119: prajānan yuktipratiśaraṇo bhavati na sthavireṇābhijñātena vā pudgalena tathāgatena vā [saṃghena vā] ime dharmā bhāṣitā iti pudgalapratisaraṇo bhavati|
1321:120: sa evaṃ yuktipratisaraṇo na pudgalapratisaraṇastattvārthāt na vicalati|
1321:121: a-parapratyayaśca bhavati dharmeṣu punarbodhisattvastathāgate viviṣṭaśraddho niviṣṭaprasāda ekāntiko vacasyabhiprasannastathāgata-nītārthaṃ sūtraṃ pratisarati na neyārtham|
1321:123: tathāhi neyārthasya sūtrasya nānāmukhaprakṛtārthavibhāgo'niścitaḥ saṃdehakaro bhavati|
1321:124: sacetpunarbodhisattvo nītārthe'pi sūtre'naikāntikaḥ syādevamasau saṃhāryaḥ syādasmāddharmavinayāt|
1321:126: sa yadbhāvanāmayena jñānena jñātavyaṃ na tacchakyaṃ śrutacintāvijñānamātrakeṇa vijñātumiti viditvā paramagambhīrānapi tathāgatabhāṣitāndharmān śrutvā na pratikṣipati nāpavadati|
1321:129: tatraiṣu caturṣu pratisaraṇeṣu samāsataścaturṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ saṃprakāśitam|
1321:133: yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvaparyāyeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam|
1321:135: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvalakṣaṇeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam|
1321:137: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvanirvacaneṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam|
1321:139: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvaprakārapadaprabhedeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam|
1321:141: etāścatasro bodhisattvapratisaṃvido niśrityo'prameyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pañcasthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam|
1321:146: ata uttari svayamabhisaṃbodho nāsti kutaḥ punaḥ pareṣāṃ prakāśanā|
1321:152: sa punaḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhāro bodhisattvasya prathame kalpāsaṃkhyeye mṛdurveditavyo dvitīye madhyastṛtīye'dhimātro veditavyaḥ|
1321:153: kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saptatriṃsatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yogaṃ karoti|
1321:154: iha bodhisattvaścatasro bodhisattvapratisaṃvido niśrityopāya-parigṛhītena jñānena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāndharmānyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:156: sa dvividhenāpi yānanayena tān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti śrāvakayānanayena ca mahāyānanayena ca|
1321:158: tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvaṃ yathā nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam|
1321:159: kathañca bodhisattvo mahāyānanayena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:160: iha bodhisattvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśī viharan naiva kāyaṃ kāyabhāvato vikalpayati|
1321:165: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ evamavaśiṣṭāni smṛtyupasthānāni aviśiṣṭāśca bodhipakṣyā dharmā veditavyāḥ|
1321:166: sa naiva kāyādīndharmān duḥkhato vā vikalpayati samudayato vā|
1321:169: nirabhilāpyasvabhāvadharmatayā ca duḥkhadharmatāṃ samudayadharmatāṃ nirodhadharmatāṃ mārgadharmatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:172: tatra yā bodhisattvasyaiṣā dharmāṇāmevamavikalpanā so'sya śamatho draṣṭavyaḥ|
1321:173: yacca tadyathābhūtajñānaṃ pāramārthikaṃ yacca tadapramāṇa-vyavasthānanayajñānaṃ dharmeṣu iyamasya vipaśyanā draṣṭavyā|
1321:175: pāramārthikasāṅketika-jñānapūrvaṅgamaḥ pāramārthikasāṃketika-jñānaphalaṃ sarvaprapañcasaṃjñāsu anābhogavāhanaḥ tasmiṃśca nirabhilāpye vastumātrai nirnimittatayā ca nirvikalpacittāśāntyā sarvadharmasamataikarasagāmī|
1321:178: etaccaturākāra-śamathapūrvaṅgamā sarvadharmeṣu samāropāsadgrāhāntavivarjitā apavādāsadgrāhāntavivarjitā apramāṇadharmaprabhedavyavasthāna-nayānugatā ca vipaśyanā|
1321:179: ebhiścaturbhirākārai rbodhisattvānāṃ vipaśyanāmārgaḥ pravartate yāvadanuttara-samyaksaṃbodhijñānidarśana-[pari] niṣpattaye samudāgamāya|
1321:186: yā bodhisattvasya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāsahagatā apekṣā yacca sarvasaṃskāreṣu yathābhūtasarvaparijñānaṃ yā cānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhijñāne spṛhā|
1321:187: yacca sattvāpekṣāṃ niśritya saṃsārāparityāgaḥ yā ca saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ niśrityāsaṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtī|
1321:197: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ parīttāni kuśalamūlāni apramāṇaphalatāyāmupanayati|
1321:198: iha bodhisattvo yat kiṃcit sattvaṃ pratyavaramapi vastvantataḥ saktuprasṛtaṃ pratyavara eva kṣetre pradāpayati antatastiryagyonigate'pi parīttaṃ tacca prāṇibhūte dāpayitvā cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃmbodhau pariṇāmayati|
1321:199: evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ vastuto'pi kṣetrato'pi parīttaṃ tacca pariṇāmanā-vaśenāpramāṇaphalatayāmupanītaṃ bhavati
1321:200: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyapramāṇāni kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayati|
1321:204: tathā ātmaklamathayogamanuyuktānāṃ mokṣakāmānāṃ mithyāprayuktānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] madhyamāṃ pratipadamantadvayavigatāṃ vyapadiśati tasyāṃ cāvatārayati|
1321:205: tathā svargakāmānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] mithyāprayuktānāmagnipraveśātaṭaprapātā'naśanasthānādibhiḥ samyagdhyānaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya cāyatyāṃ akṛchreṇa sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena svargopapattaye vyapadiśati|
1321:207: punargambhīrāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāndharmān tathā tathā uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati yathā pare śrutvā tīvrañca saṃvegamutpādayanti tīvraṃ ca prasādam|
1321:208: tadekakṣaṇikamapi saṃvegaprasādasahagataṃ cittaṃ vipula [kuśamūla] saṃgrahe saṃkhyāṃ gacchati prāgeva prābandhikam|
1321:209: punarbodhisattvo yāni kānicinmālyāni gandhajātāni ca loke vividhāni pravarāṇi praṇītāni taiḥ prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena buddhadharmasaṃgha[tri] ratnapūjāmadhimucyate parāṃścādhimocayati daśasu dikṣu|
1321:210: punaḥ sarvā diśastenaiva prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena spharitvā sarvāṃ triratnapūjāmabhyanumodate parāṃścābhyanumodayati|
1321:211: punarbuddhānusmṛtiṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayati pareṣāñca samādāpayati dharmānusmṛtiṃ saṃghānusmṛtiṃ yāvaddevatānusmṛtim|
1321:212: punarmanojalpaistriratna-namaskriyayā abandhyaṃ kālaṃ karoti kārayati ca|
1321:216: punaratītapratyutpannāni sarva-skhalitāni sarvavyatikramāṃśca kalyāṇena śikṣākāmānugatena cetasā sarvadikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike pratideśayati|
1321:218: tasyaivamabhīkṣṇaṃ skhalitaṃ pratideśayataḥ sarvakarmāvaraṇebhyo vimokṣo bhavatyalpakṛcchreṇa|
1321:219: punaḥ prabhūtairvicitraiśca nirmāṇaiḥ sarvadikṣu buddhadharmasaṃghādhiṣṭhānaṃ sattvādhiṣṭhānañcāprameyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśiprāptaḥ puṇyaparigrahaṃ karoti|
1321:222: evaṃ hi bodhisattvo'lpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyaprameyaphalāni kuśalamūlānyabhinirharati samudānayati|
1321:227: atrāpi bodhisattvasya caturvidhasyāpyasya sattvārthasyābhiniṣpattaye samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidha evopāyo veditavyaḥ|
1321:228: ānulomiko vibandhasthāyī visabhāgāśayaḥ avaṣṭambhajaḥ kṛtaprakṛtikaḥ viśuddhaśca ṣaṣṭha upāyaḥ|
1321:230: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva tāvad yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayitukāmo bhavati teṣāṃ ślakṣṇairmadhuraiḥ kāyavāksamudācārairupapradānānuvṛttisamudācāraiścātmagataṃ teṣāṃ pratighātamapanayati|
1321:234: tañca punardharmaṃ yathārhaṃ supraveśaṃ gamakaṃ kālenānupūrvamaviparītamarthopasaṃhitañca deśayati|
1321:236: sattvavinaye paramayā ca kartukāmatayā anukampācittena samanvāgato bhavati|
1321:237: sa ṛddhyā cittādeśanayā yuktarūpayā dharmadeśanayā paraṃ vā'dhyeṣya vicitrairvā prabhūtaiśca nirmitaiḥ sattvānvinayati|
1321:238: saṃkṣiptānāñcārthopasaṃhitānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ pravistaraṇatayā ativistṛtānāṃ cābhisaṃkṣepaṇatayā tathā uddeśadānena anusmaraṇaparipṛcchādānena dhṛtānāñcodgṛhītānāñca dharmāṇāṃ samyagarthavivaraṇatayā sarvālambanasamādhyavatāramukheṣucānulomikyā avavādānusāsanyā sattvānanugṛhṇāti sattvānāmarthamācarati|
1321:239: ye ca sattvā gambhīrāṇāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ sūtrāntānāmābhiprāyikaṃ tathāgatānāmarthamavijñāya ye te sūtrāntāḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti nirvastukatāmanutpannāniruddhatāmā kāśasamatāṃ māyāsvapnopamatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti teṣāṃ yathāvadarthamavijñāyotrastamānasāḥ tān sūtrāntān sarveṇa sarvaṃ pratikṣipanti naite tathāgatabhāṣitā iti|
1321:240: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ sa bodhisattvaḥ ānulomikenopāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ tathāgatābhiprāyikamarthaṃ yathāvadanulomayati|
1321:243: yathā neme dharmāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante api tvabhilāpātmakaḥ svabhāva eṣāṃ nāsti teneme niḥsvabhāvā ityucyante|
1321:244: yadyapyetavabhilāpyavastu vidyate yadāśrityābhilāpāḥ pravartante tadapi yairabhilāpairyat svabhāvamabhilapyate tadapi na tatsvabhāva paramārthataḥ|
1321:245: tasmānnirvastukā ityucyante evañca sati te'bhilāpyāḥ svabhāvā dharmāṇāmādita eva sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante|
1321:246: te kimutpatsyante vā nirotsyante vā tasmādanutpannā aniruddhā ityucyante|
1321:247: tadyathā cākāśe vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni rūpāṇi rūpakarmāṇi copalabhyante|
1321:248: sarveṣāñca teṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ rūpakarmaṇāṃ cāvakāśaṃ dadāti|
1321:250: yadā ca punastad rūpaṃ tāni ca rūpakarmāṇyapanītāni bhavanti tadā rūpābhāvamātrātmakameva pariśuddhamākāśaṃ khyāti|
1321:251: evaṃ tasminnākāśasthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividhābhilāpakṛtāḥ saṃjñā vikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ rūpakarmasthānīyāḥ pravartante|
1321:252: sarveṣāñca teṣāmabhilāpakṛtānāṃ saṃjñāvikalpānāṃ prapañcasaṃjñānugatānāṃ citrarūpakarmasthānīyānāṃ tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastvākāśa sthānīyamavakāśaṃ dadāti|
1321:253: yadā ca punarbodhisattvairjñānenāryeṇa te'bhilāpasamutthitā mithyāsaṃjñāvikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvamapanītā bhavanti tadā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paramāryāṇāṃ tenāryajñānena tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastu sarvābhilāpyasvabhāvābhāvamātramākāśopamaṃ pariśuddhaṃ khyāti|
1321:254: na ca tasmāt paramanyaṃ svabhāvamasya mṛgayante|
1321:256: tadyathā māyā na ca yathā khyāti tathāsti|
1321:257: na ca punaḥ sarveṇaiva sarvaṃ nāsti tanmāyākṛtam|
1321:258: evaṃ na caite dharmā yathaivābhilāpasaṃstavavaśena khyānti bālānāṃ tathaiva saṃvidyante|
1321:259: na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante pāramārthika-nirabhilāpyātmanā|
1321:260: te cānena nayapraveśena na santo nāsanta ityadvayā māyāvat|
1321:262: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasmāddharmadhātorna kiñcidutkṣipati na ca kiñcit pratikṣipati nonī-karoti nādhikaṃ karoti na vināśayati|
1321:266: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya vibandhasthāyī upāyaḥ iha bodhisattvo bhojanapānādi-daśa-kāyādipariṣkārārthikānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] vipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate|
1321:267: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ brāhmaṇyā vistareṇa pūrvavat yāvatsacecchīlaṃ samādāya vartadhve evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhojanapānādīn kāyapariṣkārānyāvadarthamanupradāsyāmi|
1321:269: tathā kṣetravastugṛhavastvāpaṇavastu-rājyavastu-deśavastu-dhanavastu-dhānyavastu arthikānāṃ tathā śilpakarmasthānavidyārthikānāṃ tathā tena saha sakhyārthikānāmāvāhavivāhārthikānāmābhakṣaṇasaṃbhakṣaṇārthikānāṃ kṛtyasahāyārthikānāñca sattvānāṃ kāryavipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate|
1321:270: evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ vistareṇa yāvatkṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gamiṣyāmi sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat|
1321:271: punarbodhisattvaḥ aparādhiṣu duṣiṣvapakāriṣu sattveṣu parairvadhabandhanacchedanatāḍanakutsanatarjanapravāsanāyopātteṣvādhamanabandhana-vikrayāya copātteṣu vipratibandhe nāvatiṣṭhate śaktaḥ pratibalaḥ|
1321:272: sa cenmātṛjñāḥ [pitṛjñā] bhavatheti vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato'smādvyasanādvimocayiṣyāmīti|
1321:274: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat vistareṇaivamahaṃ bhavato'smādbhayāt paritrāsyāmīti|
1321:276: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavatāṃ priyasamāgamamapriyavinābhāvaṃ copasaṃhariṣyāmīti|
1321:278: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato'smādvyādhiduḥkhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti|
1321:279: te ca sattvāḥ evaṃ vibandhāvasthitasya bodhisattvasya laghuladhveva tasmin kuśalasamādāne pāpaprahāṇe ca yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyā bhavanti|
1321:281: ye punaḥ sattvā evaṃ vibandhasthāyino bodhisattvasya yathāparikīrtiteṣu vastuṣu na laghu-laghveva yathākāmaṃ pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvo yathā parikīrtitairvastubhirarthikānāṃ tāni vastūni nānuprayacchati hitakāmatayā|
1321:283: vyasanasthān bhītānpriyāpriyasaṃyogavisaṃyogakāmān vyādhiduḥkhena ārtān sattvān kañcitkālamadhyupekṣate hitakāmatayā|
1321:285: te ca sattvā evaṃ niṣṭhurakarmaṇā pratipadyamānasya bodhisattvasya na tvāśayataḥ apareṇa samayena yathākāmakaraṇīyā bhavanti pāpaprahāṇāya kuśalasamādānāya ca|
1321:286: ye ca sattvā nāpyarthino bodhisattvasya nāpi ca vyasanasthā nāpi vistareṇa yāvadvyādhitāste cāsya saṃstutāḥ sapraṇayāḥ|
1321:287: tānapi bodhisattvastasminneva kuśala-[mūle] samādāpayati yaduta mātṛjñatāyāṃ vistareṇa yāvacchīlasamādānānuvartanāyām|
1321:288: ta evaṃ bodhisattvena samādāpyamānāḥ sa cedvikampanena [na] pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kupitamapyātmānamupadarśayati hitakāmatayā|
1321:294: visabhāgo'sya bodhisattvasya teṣu [sattveṣu] tasyāśceṣṭāyāḥ sa āśayo bhavati|
1321:295: tena ca tānsattvāṃstasmin pāpaprahāṇe kuśalasamādāne ca sanniyojayati|
1321:298: iha bodhisattvaḥ svāmibhūto vā rājabhūto vā ādhipatyaprāptaḥ svaṃ vā parijanaṃ sva vā vijitamevaṃ samyak samanuśāsti|
1321:299: yo me kaścitparijane vā vijite vā'mātṛjño bhaviṣyati vistareṇa yāvaddauśīlyaṃ samādāya vartiṣyate tasyāhamucitaṃ vā bhaktācchādanaṃ samucchetsyāmi vārayiṣyāmi vā tāḍayiṣyāmi vā sarvasvena vā viyojayiṣyāmi sarveṇa vā sarva vijitāt pravāsayiṣyāmīti|
1321:300: tatra ca karmaṇi kuśalān dakṣān pauruṣeyānviniyojayati|
1321:301: te ca sattvāstasmānmahato daṇḍakarmaṇo bhītāḥ pāpañca prajahati kuśalañca samādāya vartante|
1321:302: akāmakā api tena balāvaṣṭambhena kuśale sanniyojyante te sattvā anenopāyena|
1321:305: saha bodhisattvena yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvamevopakāraḥ parīttaḥ prabhūto vā kṛto bhavati dānena vā vyasanaparitrāṇatayā vā bhayaparitrāṇatayā vā priyāpriyasaṃyogavisayogopasaṃharaṇatayā vā vyādhisaśamanatayā vā teṣāṃ kṛtajñānāṃ kṛtavedināṃ pratyupakāra-kāmānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ kuśalasamādānameva pratikārato yācate saṃpratīcchati|
1321:309: sa cedyūyameva mātṛjñā bhavatha pitṛjñā vistareṇa yāvacchīlaṃ samādāya vartadhve kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ kuśalasamādānaṃ parataḥ pratyāsaṃśate tena copāyena parāṃstatra kuśale samādāpayati|
1321:312: iha niṣṭhāgamana-bodhisattvabhūmi-sthito bodhisattvaḥ suviśodhitabodhisattvamārgastuṣite devanikāye upapadyate|
1321:314: sa na cirasyedānīṃ jambūdvīpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate|
1321:317: punarbodhisattvastuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā ucce vā sammate vā kule upapadyate yaduta rājakule vā purohitakule vā|
1321:325: nāvaramātrakametaddharmākhyānaṃ bhavati yatredānīṃ brahmā [svayaṃ] dharmadeśanāyai bhagavantamadhyeṣata iti|
1321:328: paravyāpāritena na tu svena sattveṣu kāruṇyacittena nātmana eva pratirupatāṃ viditveti|
1321:334: yasmādupāyādanya upāya uttari atikrāntataraśca praṇītataraśca nāsti|
1321:335: itīdaṃ ṣaḍvidhamupāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samāsavyāsanirdeśataḥ pratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātāya nayanāya madhyasthānāmavatārāyāvatīrṇānāṃ paripākāya paripakkānāṃ vimocanāya|
1321:345: iha bodhisattvastadrūpāṃ smṛtiprajñābalādhānatāṃ pratilabhate yathā śrutamātrakeṇaivānāmnātān vacasā'paricitān nāmapadavyañjanakāyasaṃgṛhītānanupūrvacaritānanupūrvasamāyuktān pramāṇān granthānapramāṇaṃ kālaṃ dhārayati|
1321:351: iha bodhisattvastadrūpaṃ samādhivaśitāṃ pratilabhate yathā yāni mantrapadānīti saṃśamanāya sattvānāmadhitiṣṭhanti|
1321:356: iha bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃ pragāḍhahetucaritaḥ prajñāvān praviviktavihārī vācamapyanudīrayan darśanapathamapyanāgacchan kenacit saha tathā mātrābhojī asaṃkīrṇabhojī ekaprakārāśanabhojī pradhyānaparataḥ alpaṃ rātrau svapan bahu jāgran yānīmāni tathāgatabhāṣitāni bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya mantrapadāni tadyathā iṭi miṭi kiṭibhiḥ kṣāntipadāni svāhā|
1321:358: sa teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmevaṃ samyak pratipanna evamarthaṃ svayamevāśrutvā kutaścit pratividhyati|
1321:359: tad yathā nāstyeṣāṃ mantrapadānāṃ kācidarthapariniṣpattiḥ nirarthā evaite|
1321:362: iyatā tena teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaḥ supratividdho bhavati|
1321:363: sa teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaṃ samyak pratividhya tenaivārthānusāreṇa sarvadharmāṇāmatyarthaṃ samyak pratividhyati svayamevāśrutvā parataḥ|
1321:367: sa evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvārthaṃ samyak pratividhya tasmātparamarthaṃ na samanveṣate|
1321:369: tena bodhisattvena pratilabdhā tāni dhāraṇīpadānyadhiṣṭhāya bodhisattvakṣāntirvaktavyā|
1321:370: tasyāśca lābhāt sa bodhisattvo na cirasyedānīmadhyāśayaviśuddhiṃ pratilabhate|
1321:373: tatra dharmadhāraṇīmarthadhāraṇīñca bodhisattvaḥ prathamasya kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyātyayācchuddhādhyāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo labhate niyatāṃ sthirāmudārāñca|
1321:374: tataḥ punararvāg labhate praṇidhānavaśena vā dhyānasanniśrayeṇa vā natu niyatāṃ na sthirāṃ nodārām|
1321:376: bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya tu dhāraṇī yathaiva vyākhyātā tathaiva labhyate|
1321:377: etāḥ punaḥ sarvā dhāraṇīrbodhisattvaścaturbhiguṇairyukto labhate nānyatamavikalaḥ|
1321:381: dharmārāmaśca bhavati dharmarato bodhisattvapiṭakamārabhya piṭakamātṛkāṃ vā
1321:388: āyatyāṃ sarvabodhisattvakuśalasaṃgrahāya sarvaguṇasaṃgrahāya ca samāsato vyāsato vā praṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak praṇidhānamityucyate|
1321:392: buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāṃ saddharma-parigrahārakṣaṇatāyai dharmanetrīsandhāraṇāya mahāpraṇidhānam|
1321:402: iha bodhisattvasya sarvābhilāṣātmakena svabhāvena virahitaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu paśyataḥ yā cittasya sthitiḥ|
1321:405: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu mithyāvikalpasamutthāpitena kleśena duḥkhena ca parigṛhītatvādanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ samanupaśyato yā āyatyāṃ tatrāpraṇidhānapūrvikā cittasthitiḥ|
1321:408: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu sarvavikalpaprapañca nimittānyapanīya yathābhūtaṃ śāntato manasi kurvato yā cittasthitiḥ|
1321:411: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ dvayamidaṃ saccāsacca|
1321:412: tatra saṃskṛtamasaskṛtañca sat asadātmā vātmīyaṃ vā|
1321:415: yat punaretadasadeva vastu tatra bodhisattvena na praṇidhānaṃ nāpraṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam|
1321:418: evaṃ hi bodhisattva eṣu triṣu samādhiṣu yogaṃ karoti|
1321:420: tadanyākārānapi trīnsamādhīnyathābhūta-vyavasthāna-nayapraveśena bhāvanā-nayapraveśena ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yeṣu śrāvakāḥ śikṣante samudāgacchati ca|
1321:421: catvārīmāni dharmoddānāni yāni buddhāśca bodhisattvāśca sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye deśayanti|
1321:427: etat pratisaṃyuktārtha yadbhūyasā dharmamudīrayanti buddhabodhisattvāḥ sattvānām|
1321:432: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ nityakālameva nāstītyupalabhyānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārān paśyati|
1321:433: punaravijñātasya bhūtatastasyaiva nirabhilāpyasya vastunaḥ aparijñānahetukamudayavyayamupalabhyatān nirabhilāpyasvabhāvān sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati|
1321:436: tasmātteṣāṃ naiva hetuto naiva svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati|
1321:440: tasmātteṣāṃ svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati no tu hetutaḥ|
1321:444: tasmātteṣāṃ bodhisattvo hetuto vidyamānatāṃ paśyati no tu svabhāvataḥ|
1321:445: sa eva triṣvadhvasvavyavacchinnāṃ saṃskāra-santatiṃ pravartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaikasmin saṃskārakṣaṇe trīṇi saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni paśyati|
1321:447: tatra pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇe svabhāvavināśānantara yo'pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇasvabhāvaprādurbhāvaḥ sā jātiriti paśyati|
1321:449: taṃ pūrvaniruddhaṃ saṃskārajñaṇasvabhāvamapekṣya tasyotpannasya yadanyatvamanyathātvaṃ vā sā jareti paśyati|
1321:450: tasmājjātikṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ tasyaivotpannasya saṃskārakṣaṇasya yaḥ svabhāvavināśaḥ sa vyaya iti paśyati|
1321:452: tatsvabhāvāneva tasya jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāṃ ca|
1321:454: tasmācca kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca eva tasya saṃskārakṣaṇa [svabhāva] syāpagamaḥ sa eva teṣāṃ jātyādīnāmiti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati tānyetāni catvāryaṣi saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyabhisamasya saṃskārāṇāṃ samāsato dvayāvasthā-prabhāvitāni|
1321:456: tatra bhagavatā yo bhāvastadekaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam|
1321:458: sa ca bhāvasteṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthityanyathātvaprabhāvita iti kṛtvā tṛtīyaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam|
1321:459: tatra bodhisattvaḥ saṃskāramātraṃ sthāpayitvā na tasya jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatāṃ sarvakālaṃ dravyasvabhāvapariniṣpattitaḥ paśyati|
1321:462: nāsyānyāṃ jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatām|
1321:463: saṃskāramātrameva ca jāyamānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ jīryamāṇaṃ vinaśyamānamupalabhate|
1321:465: yuktyāpi bodhisattvo vimṛśannetān jātyādīn dravyato nopalabhate|
1321:467: sa cedrūpādisaṃskāravinirmuktaḥ anyo jātidharmaḥ syāt sa yathaiva rūpādikaḥ saṃskāraḥ svātmanotpadyate|
1321:469: evaṃ sati dve janmanī syātām yacca saṃskāra-janma yacca jāti-janma tatra tatsaṃskārajanma tasmājjātijanmanaḥ ananyadeva vā syāt|
1321:473: atha ca punaranyadevaṃ sati saṃskāra-janma jātirna bhavati|
1321:475: yathā jātirevaṃ sthitirjarā vināśaśca vistareṇa veditavyaḥ|
1321:476: sa cedvināśo nāma svabhāvato dharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ syāt so'pyutpadyeta nirudhyeta vā|
1321:477: yadā ca vināśa utpannaḥ syāttadā sarvasaṃskārairniruddhairbhavitavyaṃ syāt|
1321:478: evaṃ satyalpakṛcchreṇa nirodhasamāpannasyeva cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāmapravṛttiḥ syāt|
1321:479: tasya ca punarvināśasya nirodhāt niruddhairapi taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ punareva bhavitavyaṃ syāt vināśa eṣāṃ nāstīti kṛtvā|
1321:480: ato vināśa utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na yujyate|
1321:481: na ca punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā sarvakālāstitāñca dravyasatāṃ svabhāvapariniṣpatiñca prajñapti satāṃ paśyato nirvidvirāgo vimuktiśca yujyate|
1321:483: ityebhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:484: tān punareva anityān saṃskārān prabandhena vartamānādbodhisattvaḥ triḥprakārāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ sanniśrayabhāvena paśyati saṃskāraduḥkhatāyāḥ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyāḥ duḥkhaduḥkhatāyāśca|
1321:485: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:486: punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:492: yatsarveṣvabhilāpyeṣu vastuṣu sarvābhilāpasvabhāvo dharmo na saṃvidyate|
1321:493: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmā anātmāna iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti|
1321:497: evaṃ ca tāvadanadhyāśayaśuddho bodhisattvaḥ adṛṣṭasatyo vā śrāvakāyānīyo nirvāṇamadhimukto bhavati|
1321:499: na cāsya tasminnirvāṇe yathābhūtāvagamo yathāvajjñānadarśanaṃ pravartate|
1321:501: tadyathā rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā rājñā gṛhapatinā vā'ntargṛhe saṃvardhitaḥ syāt tasya ca daharasyaiva kumārabhūtasya tena rājñā gṛhapatinā vā kṛtrimakā mṛgarathakā vā go-aśvarathakā vā hastirathakā vā upasaṃhṛtā bhaveyuḥ|
1321:502: sa ca rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā taiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayaṃsteṣveva kṛtrimeṣu mṛgeṣu mṛgasaṃjñī syāt kṛtrimeṣu go'śveṣu hastiṣu hastisaṃjñī syāt|
1321:503: athaikadā sa rājā vā gṛhapatirvā svasya putrasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākādbhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta|
1321:505: tasya punā rājaputrasya [vā] gṛhapatiputrasya vā ta varṇavādaṃ śrutvā evaṃ syāt|
1321:506: eṣāmayaṃ rājā gṛhapatirvā asmākaṃ mṛgarathakānāṃ yāvaddhastirathakānāṃ vā varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti|
1321:507: athāpareṇa samayena sa rājā gahapatirvā svaṃ putraṃ bahirāgārānnivīṣya bhūtāneva mṛgāṃstasmai upadarśayedbhūtāneva yāvaddhastina upadarśayet|
1321:508: tasya tān dṛṣṭvā tasminsamaye pratyātmaṃ pratyavagamo yathābhūta utpadyeta|
1321:509: ime te bhūtārthikā mṛgarathakā vistareṇa yāvaddhastirathakā yeṣāmasmākaṃ pitā dīrgharātraṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣitavānasmākameva tvayathābhūte arthe tat pratirūpamātrake tatpratibimbapratibhāsamātrake adhimokṣaḥ pravṛtta iti|
1321:511: evameva saṃsārāntargṛhasaṃvṛddhānāmaśuddhāśayānāṃ bodhisattvānāmadṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ putrasthānīyānāṃ pitṛkalpairbuddhairbodhisattvaiśca mahābhūmipraviṣṭairnirvāṇapratyakṣadarśibhisteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca purastānnirvāṇasya yathādṛṣṭasya varṇo bhāṣitaḥ|
1321:512: taiśca tannirvāṇaṃ guṇato ghoṣamātrānusariṇyā buddhyā dīrgharātramadhimuktam|
1321:513: yadā punasteṣāṃ saṃbhāraparipākavṛddheranvayāt śraddhāśayānāñca bodhisattvānāṃ dṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ nirvāṇe pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate|
1321:515: idaṃ tannirvāṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yasya buddhabodhisattvairvarṇā bhāṣitaḥ|
1321:519: te tena pūrvakeṇādhimokṣeṇa ritīyante paścimakaṃ yathābhūtādhimokṣaṃ niśritya|
1321:520: tadyathā kiñcidvyādhitaṃ puruṣaṃ kaścinmahāvaidyastasya prapyupasthitasya vyādheḥ praśamāyānulomikairbhaiṣajyairūpatiṣṭhet|
1321:521: sa ca vyādhitapuruṣo dīrghakālapratiniṣevaṇātteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyānāṃ tadadhimukta eva bhavet tadārāmaḥ|
1321:523: atha tasyaiva vyādhitapuruṣasya sa ca pūrvako vyādhistayā bhaiṣajyāsevayā vyupaśāmyedanyaścāpūrvo vyādhiranyabhaiṣajyasādhyaḥ prādurbhavet|
1321:524: atha sa mahāvaidyaḥ pūrvakasya ca vyādheḥ praśamaṃ paścimakasya cotpādamanyabhaiṣajyasādhyaṃ viditvā tañca pūrvakaṃ bhaiṣajyaprayogaṃ pratikṣipedanyaṃ cānulomikaṃ vyapadiśed bhaiṣajyam|
1321:525: sa bālo vyādhita puruṣaḥ pūrvabhaiṣajyādhimuktasteṣveva pathyasaṃjñī yenaiva mahāvaidyena tāni pūrvapaścimāni bhaiṣajyāni vyapadiṣṭāni|
1321:526: evamapyucyamānastena saṃmukhamapathyānyetāni pūrvakāṇi bhaiṣajyāni paścime vyādhāviti saṃpratyayena na gacchannāṣya vacanamabhiśraddhavyādevameva tadupamāste bālā bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakāśca veditavyāḥ|
1321:527: ye vyādhitapuruṣā eva kleśagrastā mahāvaidyasya tathāgatasyottarāduttaratarāmuttamatamāmuttānāduttānatarāṃ gambhīrād gambhīratarāṃ gambhīratamāṃ hīnādudārāmudāratarāmudāratamāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ samyagvyapadeśamavavādānuśāsanīṃ nāvataranti nādhimucyante na pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam|
1321:528: tatra śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ śrāvako vā na kasmiṃścittathāgatabhāṣite vimatisandehamutpādayati|
1321:529: sa punaḥ sarvāṅgapariṣkārasusamāyuktamivājanyarathaṃ taṃ tathāgatabhāṣitaṃ dharmarathamabhirūhya kuśala iva sārathiryāvatī tena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghuladhveva gantā bhavatyadhandhāyamānaḥ|
